Articles.Content:
Hi,
I wanted to show my latest work, a realistic map of Titan, but with some of my personal touch to make it more beautiful to the eye.:D


I started from last map in infrared released by the Cassini team and I replaced the data with those of the poles of the radar, to have a better resolution of the coasts of the seas!:cool:

[URL="https://flic.kr/p/AxFk7v"][IMG]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5696/22674615149_59f4a8842d_c.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="https://flic.kr/p/B8JvB5"][IMG]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/660/23059996646_6d550aeb83.jpg[/IMG][/URL] [URL="https://flic.kr/p/Bc2qGZ"][IMG]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5827/23097246561_009b89b933.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


My main intention was it to have a better map for the Real Solar System, since the current one is not beautiful:(. But I also loaded on spaceengine ... and with adequate Bumpmap here the seas that come to life!:cool:

[URL="https://flic.kr/p/AcF1sb"][IMG]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/581/22448222454_da61486186_c.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="https://flic.kr/p/B9H58V"][IMG]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/657/23071032355_b27d2d36cc_c.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


I hope you enjoyed it and that is really inserted in RSS!:rolleyes: Edited November 17, 2015 by Spock1108
How did you get the bumpmap done right?
A couple of days of work ... but if I'm interested to release the Mod forum of SE ... the time to fix the last details XD
